              Liang Fu付亮
            
            
              
                
            
          
        
        
        
          
            Welcome to my personal website!
            I am a PhD candidate at Department of Economics, University at Albany, SUNY. My main research fields are Monetary Economics and International Economics. My currenct research focus on China’s evolving monetary policy framework. 
            CV
            lfu@albany.edu

articles.title: Research
articles.contents:
Working Papers
Monetary Policy Surprises and Interest Rates under China’s Evolving Monetary Policy Framework (with Chun-Yu Ho) [August 2021, Revision Requested by Emerging Markets Review]
Political Stability and Credibility of Currency Board (with Shu Feng, Chun-Yu Ho and Wai-Yip Alex Ho) [August 2021, Revision Requested by Journal of International Money and Finance]
Real Exchange Rate and Innovation: Firm-Level Evidence from China (with Chun-Yu Ho and Xiaoli Zhang) [January 2021]
